docs.snippet: Michel Allatuain waited beneath the 14th century fortress at the port of this Greek island on Thursday, desperate for a ferry ticket to the European mainland and a better life....
docs.lead_paragraph: Michel Allatuain waited beneath the 14th century fortress at the port of this Greek island on Thursday, desperate for a ferry ticket to the European mainland and a better life.

headline.main: Greek Island Bears Brunt as People-Smugglers Take Turkish Route
headline.print_headline: Greek Island Bears Brunt as People-Smugglers Take Turkish Route
